hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select EOSP.EOSP_ID, EOSP.CREATOR, EOSP.CREATE_TIME, EOSP.MODIFIER, EOSP.MODIFY_TIME, EOSP.REC_VER, EOSP.REC_STATUS, EOSP.ORG_ID, EOSP.EOSP_CODE, EOSP.EOSP_NAME, EOSP.EOSP_NAME_EN, EOSP.EOSP_CUSTOMER_CODE, EOSP.EOSP_CUSTOMER_NAME, EOSP.EOSP_ORDER_TYPE_CODE, EOSP.EOSP_ORDER_TYPE_NAME, EOSP.EOSP_PRIORITY, EOSP.EOSP_REMARK, EOSP.EOSP_AUTO_SPLIT, EOSP.EOSP_FOR_SPLIT_TIMER, EOSP.EOSP_RETAIN_ORIGINAL_ORDER, EOSP.EOSP_RETAIN_ATTACHMENT, EOSP.EOSP_RETAIN_EXTENSION, EOSP.EOSP_RETAIN_FEE, EOSP.EOSP_RETAIN_REMARK from EO_ORDER_SPLIT_PARAM EOSP where 1=1 <<and EOSP.EOSP_ID = :eospId>> <<and EOSP.REC_STATUS = :recStatus>> <<and EOSP.ORG_ID = :orgId>> <<and EOSP.EOSP_CODE = :eospCode>> <<and EOSP.EOSP_NAME LIKE :eospName>> <<and EOSP.EOSP_NAME_EN LIKE :eospNameEn>> <<and EOSP.EOSP_CUSTOMER_CODE = :eospCustomerCode>> <<and EOSP.EOSP_CUSTOMER_NAME LIKE :eospCustomerName>> <<and EOSP.EOSP_ORDER_TYPE_CODE = :eospOrderTypeCode>> <<and EOSP.EOSP_ORDER_TYPE_NAME LIKE :eospOrderTypeName>> <<and EOSP.EOSP_PRIORITY = :eospPriority>> <<and EOSP.EOSP_REMARK = :eospRemark>> <<and EOSP.EOSP_AUTO_SPLIT = :eospAutoSplit>>
